entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:26 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -40.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 10:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -40.7°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -57
Dewpoint: -45.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 37. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 56. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 44. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Ice fog patches developing this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 44. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 59 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 38. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Ice fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 61 in the morning and minus 54 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Friday 17 February 2023
